tool_description:
Create a film strip image showing stitched frames of a video.
Useful to display a video preview, a video trimmer interface, or a Video Tooltip Thumbnail in a web view.
Full API specs at https://stupeflix-tasks-api.readthedocs.org/en/v1/tasks.html#video-strip
name: Stupeflix video.strip - Create a film strip image from a video
title: Stupeflix video.strip - Create a film strip image from a video
tool_name: Stupeflix video.strip - Create a film strip image from a video

api_list.name: video.strip create_file
api_list.description: Create and queue a video.strip Task, block until finished and redirect to output image file. Full API specs at https://stupeflix-tasks-api.readthedocs.org/en/latest/tasks.html#video-strip
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stupeflixvideostrip.p.rapidapi.com/create_file"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stupeflixvideostrip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stupeflixvideostrip.p.rapidapi.com/create_file"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stupeflixvideostrip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
